ABOUT THIS GAME
Join to the war in the underground complexes. Fight for resources with use of powerful mechs and bots. Research for newest technology and gain an advantage over your opponent.

THE PLOT

In the distant future, humanity will colonize nearby solar systems. The fight for new worlds will be fought between dozens of military-mining corporations. However, human life will be too expensive, to risk it. On the front line the corporations uses mechs and artificial intelligence. You are one of the commanders of the small combat squad responsible for obtaining new resources.

THE MECHANICS

The game is a turn based tactical RPG with roguelike elements. Main action take a place on underground complexes, where Player and NPC factions fights, trade and make covenants with use of rich technology tree.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 or AMD Radeon equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
